pages.text: Dying soldiers are wanderers of the battlefield plains. They're always alert and ready to attack. $(br2)Though they are in a decaying state, don't be fooled! They're still a threat, packing a punch with their flintlocks and iron musket balls. They are often seen targeting $(l:neutral_creatures/minuteman)minutemen$(), $(l:neutral_creatures/field_medic)field medics$(), iron golems, villagers, and of course, players.
